name: Marshall Wace
languages: Python C Cpp Java C# Rust everything
benefits:
- **Comparison-beating Compensation**: Top-tier base + distinct bonus structure.
- **Health**: Fully paid medical, dental, vision.
- **Perks**: On-site gym, catered meals (breakfast/lunch), learning allowance.
- **Culture**: Meritocratic, flat structure, no silos.

name: IMC Trading
description: At IMC, we look for people who want to innovate and collaborate. You aren't seen as a graduate or an intern when you join - as soon as you onboard, we see you as an IMCer. If you are someone who gets energy from challenging the status quo and not afraid of pushing boundaries - this could be a great place for you
contributions: Motivation, drive and in general, be passionate about what you do
lookingFor: Motivation, drive and in general, be passionate about what you do
benefits:
- **Global Mobility**: Opportunities to work in Amsterdam, Chicago, Sydney.
- **Learning**: Continuous education budget, tech conferences.
- **Lifestyle**: In-house bar, barista, gym memberships, team trips.
- **Ownership**: Profit sharing for all employees.

name: Hudson River Trading
description: Hudson River Trading is a multi-asset class quantitative trading firm that provides liquidity on global markets and directly to our clients.
benefits:
- **Top of Market Pay**: Extremely competitive salary and bonuses.
- **Meals**: Breakfast, lunch, and dinner provided daily.
- **Office**: 'Play tank' with games, private terrace, gym.
- **Health**: Premium health insurance, 100% covered premiums.

name: Jump Trading
description: We bring together brilliant minds in math, physics, and computer science to explore the edges of what’s possible and turn breakthrough research into real-world impact in global markets.

name: G-Research
description: We are solving a harder problem than anyone else - projecting the future of a complex emergent system far into the future - using the most advanced tools available (deep learning). To get this right, we abide by the scientific method, test hypotheses, and ensure we have deep understanding of the problem itself
contributions: Analytical problem solving, knowing how to bridge theory to practice
lookingFor: Analytical problem solving, knowing how to bridge theory to practice

name: Citadel
description: If you're ready to explore a career here, we're ready to hear from you. Find a role that helps you follow your passions and apply your skills.

name: JetBrains

name: Bending Spoons
description: We give employees (interns included) a chance to have a real impact on the company from day one. It really doesn't matter how much experience you have or what your background is. A good idea is a good idea, no matter how long you've been in the company.
skills: We don't really look for specific technical skills.
contributions: A whole lot of passion for what you do!
lookingFor: A whole lot of passion for what you do!
